props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the field is no longer editable and will not be saved

props.name: help
props.description: Optional help text below the field

props.name: label
props.description: A descriptive label for the field

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: required
props.description: If `true`, the field has to be filled in correctly to be submitted

props.name: columns
props.description: What columns to show in the table

props.name: empty
props.description: The text, that is shown when the field has no entries.

props.name: limit
props.description: How many rows to show per page

props.name: prepend
props.description:
Whether to insert new entries at the top
of the list instead at the end

props.name: sortable
props.description: Whether to allow sorting of rows

props.name: sortBy
props.description: Expression by which to sort rows automatically

methods.name: open
methods.description:
Edit the structure field entry at `index` position
in the structure form with field `field` focused
